translated: The One Hundred and One Groups

analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta
translated: This was said by the Blessed One, said by the Arahant, so I have heard:

original: “Ekadhammo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ.
analyzed: eka dhammaḥ bhikkhave loke uppajjamānaḥ uppajjati bahu jana hitāya bahu jana sukhāya bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya deva manussāna
translated: “Monks, there is one thing that, when arisen in the world, arises for the welfare of the many, for the happiness of the many, for the good, welfare, and happiness of devas and humans.

original: Saṅghe kho pana, bhikkhave, samagge na ceva aññamaññaṁ bhaṇḍanāni honti, na ca aññamaññaṁ paribhāsā honti, na ca aññamaññaṁ parikkhepā honti, na ca aññamaññaṁ pariccajanā honti.
analyzed: saṅghe kho pana bhikkhave samagge na ca iva aññamaññam bhaṇḍanāni honti na ca aññamaññam paribhāsāḥ honti na ca aññamaññam parikkhepāḥ honti na ca aññamaññam pariccajanāḥ honti
translated: When the Sangha is in harmony, they don’t quarrel with one another, don’t abuse one another, don’t find fault with one another, and don’t publicly upbraid one another.

original: Tattha appasannā ceva pasīdanti, pasannānañca bhiyyobhāvo hotī”ti.🔽Etamatthaṁ bhagavā avoca.
analyzed: tattha appasannā ca iva pasīdanti pasannānam ca bhiyyobhāvaḥ hoti iti  etam attham bhagavān avoca
translated: Those without confidence become confident, and those with confidence increase.”🔽The Blessed One said this.
And in connection with this, it was said:
“The happiness of harmony in the Sangha,
the support of those in harmony,
one who delights in harmony, who is firm in the Dhamma,
doesn’t destroy the security of the body.
Having brought the Sangha into harmony,
for an eon he rejoices in heaven.”

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
translated: This is the meaning of what was said by the Blessed One, so I have heard.
